inn1.comm: starts with a back of length ball angling across, Smith lets it through to the keeper
wider outside off, Smith shoulders arms
length ball on off stump, nudged behind square leg to get Smith and South Africa's first runs of the day
loud appeal for lbw, turned down, Sri Lanka ponder whether to go for the review, they wisely decide against it as that ball pitched well outside leg stump
snakes away a bit outside off, off the inside-half of the bat, the ball rolls to the leg side when Smith wanted to direct it towards off
pitched up, blocked back towards the bowler
length ball on middle and leg, defended to the leg side by Petersen
short of length ball, on middle stump, tucked to square leg
beaten outside off, Petersen is sucked towards that short of ball pitching outside off, tentative
Petersen's off the mark by guiding the ball towards deep backward point
short of length ball outside off, defended by Smith towards cover
no yorkers or bouncers all over from Malinga, keeps it on a length just outside off, worked behind square leg
keeps it around off, Smith content to block it back to the bowler
slanting across the batsman outside off, Smith shoulders arms
short of length ball just outside off, Smith gets behind the line and defends it to the leg side

a massive gap between bat and pad as Smtih looks to drive, a regulation delivery pitching outside off and angling across, Smith looked to punch that through the off, the ball goes through between bat and pad
outside the off stump, Smith is happy to leave
a maiden for Kulasekara, this didn't bounce much after pitching well outside off, a fuller delivery which Smith allowed through to the keeper
gorgeous front-foot drive from Petersen, on-the-up, the ball was moving away a hint, Petersen strides forward and punches it through extra cover
a touch fuller, on the pads this time, clipped to square leg for a single
shortish ball on leg stump, Smith works it towards square leg for one more

Malinga gets the breakthrough, short of length ball, Petersen decides to play that off the front foot, the ball moves away a hint, Petersen pokes at it, the outside edge results, a good low catch by Mathews at first slip
a full ball on the pads, squeezed towards square leg
short of length ball on middle stump, clipped towards deep backward square leg for a single
outside off and Smith allows it through to the keeper once more
punched towards mid-off, fielder dives to try stop that, but can't collect it cleanly, a sharp single is taken after some confusion whether to go for the run or not
full and on the pads, easy job helping it behind square leg
pitched up by Kulasekara, punched back towards the bowler
length ball just outside off, defended towards the bowler
another tidy over from Kulasekara, this was outside off, Smith jumps across and defends towards the bowler once more
du Plessis is nonplussed by that one, short of length ball just outside off, not too much movement but du Plessis was still surprised by that one, looked to defend and is beaten
solidly defended towards cover this time

does du Plessis get a taste of his own medicine there? he pushes the ball towards midwicket and sets off for a very tight single, Lahiru Thirimanne is on to it quickly, diving to stop it and there's no delay in releasing the ball, a direct hit but du Plessis has made his ground by a couple of inches
steered off the back foot towards backward point
length ball outside off, guided to backward point once more, a loud call of 'Wait' and then 'No' as the batsmen decide there's no single
shorter this time, again no room outside off, pushed towards cover off the back foot
Kula also probing just outside off, his natural angle takes the ball away from the left-hander, defended by Smith
Smith gets his first boundary, there was a leg gully in place but Smith manages ot get it past him, he edged that between his legs and bisected the leg gully and the keeper to get a boundary
length ball outside off, defended to point
length ball just outside off, defended back towards the bowler
a muscular swat from Smith, charging down the track, moving away from leg stump to get some room to swing the arms, drills that short of length ball to the long-on boundary
defends the last ball of the over to the bowler
pushes a gentle length ball towards point
walks across and outside the off stump, but gets too close to the line, tries to dab it away but there is point and a slip around
can't get the single again, dabs it towards slip
this time Angelo puts in some more effort in to the delivery, gets it to bounce and move away from back of a length, Faf has a flail and misses
he is not finding Angelo's deliveries gentle at all, this time he tries to run this length ball towards third man, but is beaten
point comes into play again as Faf pushes tentatively towards him, he's putting pressure on himself
drops this one close to the pitch on the off side, Kula cannot get there in time, mid off runs in and picks it up, the batsmen have completed the run by then
moves forward, opens the face, and finds point again, not that he was looking to do much with the delivery anyway
advances down the track but only ends up pushing this pitched up ball to extra cover
cannot work with the incoming angle for runs on the leg side, gets himself into some tangle as he gets outside the crease, this is becoming a struggle for Faf
he cannot step out now, is caught in the crease to one that nips back in, was going down leg
thwacked straight to mid on, finding no timing or footwork at the moment
slanted too far wide across the left-hander
Smith finds some runs for South Africa, charges out, and lifts Angelo over extra cover
he is already standing outside leg before the ball is bowled, but mishits the stroke to shortish point
mistimed completely, now he is quite close to the line as he looks to guide it square
widish ball, and Smith connects, but a superb dive by point to his left saves the boundary

Faf gets one away finally, not exactly off the middle of the bat as he charges down and looks to lift it over mid off, the bat turns in his hands and the ball goes high in the air and plonks down ultimately some feet inside the extra cover rope
this one takes off from a length and surprises Faf who was motioning forward, he fends it away awkwardly, looking unconvincing, extremely
short ball is pulled towards midwicket for a single
works this towards midwicket from outside off
short of length ball just outside off, defended off the front foot to the bowler
short of length ball outside off, looks to slap it past point, bottom-edge and the ball rolls to the off side
an adventurous shot from Smith, skates down the track and looks to club it over the off side, top edge towards third man
grunts as he lets that delivery rip, too wide outside off
outside off once more, but not as wide, du Plessis shuffles across and flicks it towards midwicket
a bouncer from Mathews, called a wide
du Plessis looks to work that to the leg side, edges it almost all the way to the bowler, Mathews dives forward but the ball lands short of him
clipped behind square leg for a single this time
short of length and outside off, Smith looks to slap that to point, not too well timed

Smith survives, attempts another power-packed swat, no foot work at all as he looks to hammer a ball way outside off, edges it, it flies high over the bowler's head and lands between long-on and long-off
stays in the crease and pokes this towards point

another heave, again not perfect, gets him a boundary nonetheless, the timing was completely off on that as Smith looked to slug a shortish ball from outside off to midwicket, enough brute force on that to send it to the rope
a confident on-the-up drive off the front foot, punched towards extra cover but the placement isn't great
well outside off, du Plessis throws his bat at the one, sends the ball scurrying towards deep point
length ball just outside off, Smith taps the ball between midwicket and mid-on and scampers a single
too wide of the off stump

a bit of width this time, cracked behind point by du Plessis, Lahiru Thirmanne has fielded well today, he had plenty of ground to cover before cutting that off near the rope, South Africa's 50 comes up
firmly punched to the right of the bowler, Perera gets a hand on it to take the pace off, still time to take two as the ball rolls past mid-on
outside off and that is slammed past sweeper cover for four by du Plessis, getting a move on now after his slow start
defended towards the bowler first up
Smith jumps beyond leg even before the bowler releases the ball, has done that a few times today, looks to carve the ball through cover, bottom edge, and the ball dribbles to the off side
carefully defended down the track
swept towards deep backward square leg
driven towards midwicket by du Plessis
a hint of turn there for Senanayake, du Plessis works the ball towards midwicket, wants one but is sent back by Smith
full ball on middle and off, pushed towards mid-on for a single
length ball on the pads, played with soft hand towards square leg, that's the 50 stand between Smith and Faf
length ball outside off, Smith leans across and defends it to the off side
just a but of width, chopped towards backward point
pitched up and just outside off, eased towards long-off for a single
defended to the leg side to end the over
Smith tucks the first ball towards midwicket for a single
spins in from a length, worked to square leg
uses his wrists to steer the ball wide of backward square leg and gets a single
Smith looks to paddle this time, takes it from just outside off, places it fine past the keeper, doesn't try to hit that too hard
looks to repeat the shot this time but he misses and is struck on the arm, a mild appeal for lbw
defended towards midwicket to end the over
lovely hit from du Plessis, charges down the track and launches that length ball over long-off, crisply struck for four
a low full toss, punched towards mid-off by du Plessis
too wide from Perera, slapped towards sweeper cover by du Plessis
once again Smith skips beyond leg stump early, Perera follows him and Smith can't get that away as he is cramped for room
full and down the leg side, thought that was a wide but the umpire hasn't signalled it, perhaps it brushed the pad
short of length ball just outside off, jabbed towards point to end the over

Senanayake takes his first wicket in ODIs, du Plessis again shuffles down the track, lofts the ball towards long-on, taking the fielder on, he fails to clear him, not enough power to clear Mathews, who calmly collects that after initially moving the wrong way, that's his second catch of the game, that struck the inside-half of du Plessis' bat
defended from the crease to the leg side
works this wide of midwicket this time
a length ball outside off, worked towards midwicket
gets the leading edge as he closes the face too early
spins in towards legstump, edged on to the pad and the ball runs towards short fine
tucks it to deep square leg for a single
short of length ball outside off, de Villiers guides that towards third man for a single, he's off the mark
short of length once more, just outside off, defended towards point and Smith calls early for a single
keeps it close to off, de Villiers stays in the crease and works it behind square leg for a single
on the pads this time, Smith shuffles across and tucks the ball towards square leg, that's the fifth single of the over

de Villiers shows his class early on, a big stride forward before unleashing an eye-catching cover drive, the timing was spot-on, sends the ball through the in-field but not past an alert Thirimanne on the boundary
cuts away after pitching outside off, Smith taps the ball towards backward point, a diving stop there by Senanayake
stifled lbw appeal, that one comes in a touch, Smith doesn't bother with foot work as he looks to play that, inside-edges it on to his pads

shorter this time from Malinga, Smith loves the pull shot, plays it effectively this time, Chandimal gets across quickly to stop that from reaching the rope, Sri Lanka's fielding has been very good today
well outside off, Smith guides the ball towards short cover
just a bit of width, Smith stays rooted to the crease as he looks to play it fine past short third man,can't beat the fielder
full and hurting in towards off stump, pushed back towards the bowler, just two off that Powerplay over
Herath begins with a length ball that is pushed towards extra cover
flatter and outside off, poked towards point
length ball on middle and leg, no turn for Herath, placed towards midwicket for a single
fuller ball on middle and leg, pushed to the right of the bowler
worked towards square leg, no single this time

an appeal for a stumping, third umpire is called, Smith wanted to sweep that from well outside off, it was quite full, Smith's back foot was quite close to the crease but he never dragged it out of the crease, he's safe
a length ball is punched towards mid-off, the bottom hand comes off the bat as de Villiers plays that
short of length ball just outside off, 'yes, yes, yes, yes,' is the early call after de Villiers glides  the ball towards short third man
fuller on the pads, clipped to midwicket, straight at the fielder
short of length ball on the pads, Smith wanted to help that towards square leg, the ball takes the edge and rolls towards point
length ball heading for off, studiously defended back towards the bowler, nothing fancy from Kula here, but managing to keep things quiet
pitched up and outside off, punched towards midwicket, can't place it wide enough to get a single
pushed towards extra cover for a single, de Villiers continues to look completely at ease, as he has most of this series
Smith was looking to charge down initially, Herath bowls the delivery that leaves the left-hander, too wide for Smith, who has to retreat back to his crease
flatter and full, slammed towards midwicket by Smith for a single
outside off, AB sways backwards to make more room, coaxes it towards point
another easy single, this time to midwicket
a shot which AB played so well in the previous game, the drive through extra cover, Malinga has to sprint to his right in the deep to field that
waits for the ball outside off, uses its pace to guide it to third man
length ball, Smith skates down the track and looks to muscle that one, gets it over cover off a thick outside edge, gets him two
defends this towards backward point, thinks of a single before yelling "NO"
successive fifties for Smith, brings it up with a trademark mow to midwicket, not the most beautiful of shots, but it has got him loads of runs, charges out and swats that for four
length ball on the pads, not a great line from Perera, easily helped towards deep backward square leg
once more de Villiers helps the ball along to third man for one, that's a shot both he and Amla uses very well in one-dayers
length ball just outside off, driven towards cover to bring up the South African 100
full ball is punched towards the bowler
length ball heading for leg stump, de Villiers drives it towards long-off for a single
shorter this time, on the pad, worked behind square leg
length ball is punched to long-on for one more, no risk cricket this from South Africa, still keeps the runs flowing
a polite enquiry from Sanga whether that was lbw, 'not out,' says the umpire, that was heading down leg
you can't keep de Villiers quiet when he's in this form, there's his first big hit of the day, charges down to Dilshan and slams it over midwicket for a huge six
collects the single now by working the ball to deep square leg
punched back towards the bowler by Smith
nicely fielded by Dilshan, Smith tapped it wide to the bowler's right, Dilshan managed to scramble across to stop it
eased to long-on for a single
nine off the over as AB helps the final ball towards short fine leg
defended to the leg side by AB
helped behind square leg for a single
helped beyond square leg for one more
pushed towards extra cover
full and on the pads, punched towards long-on for a single
just outside off, Smith rocks back and slaps the ball in front of point for a single
gets on his knee and sweeps that to deep backward square leg
a bit of an edge sends the ball towards midwicket
punched back to the bowler
Senanayake flights it once more, spins in a touch, worked towards mid-on for a single
swatted powerfully by Smith, gets on one knee and slams that well in front of square for a big six, that was right off the middle
after the most powerful of sweeps, he now plays the most delicate of them, guided down towards fine leg by Smith
full ball on middle and leg, punched towards long-on
full ball is punched towards the bowler, a misfield but the ball doesn't dribble far enough to allow a single
de Villiers slowing down a touch here, gets a leading edge towards the off side as he looks to drive it to the leg side
down the leg side, de Villiers attempts a flamboyant vertical sweep of sorts, he misses, Sanga can't collect
full and on the pads, clipped towards midwicket
once more it is full and on the leg stump, punched towards shortish midwicket, Dilshan dives to prevent the single
helped down to long-on for one more to end the over
spins away after pitching around off, Smith defends off the front foot towards point
on middle and leg, defended to the leg side
goes for the sweep and misses, lbw appeal, but was heading down leg

direct hit but Smith is safe, Smith pokes the ball towards point and takes off for the run, nearly collides with the bowler, Senanayake's life must have flashed before his eyes as he saw a bulldozing Smith charging towards him
pushed towards long-off for a single to end the over
full and on leg stump, de Villiers plays it inside out towards cover
a low full toss is clubbed towards long-on for a single
an inside-edge as de Villiers looks to drive that through the off, the ball rolls towards mid-on
outside edge this time, Smith was looking to work it to the leg side, the ball dribbles behind point

down the track to get to the pitch, thumps it wide of long-on, immediately calls for two, de Villiers is really quick so he was always going to make it, the fielder realises that and throws to the keeper's end, a good throw as well, Smith just makes it before Sanga breaks the stumps
defends it towards square leg
a length ball, de Villiers mistimes a drive to mid-on
de Villiers glides this one towards third man for one more
superb stroke from Smith, jumps away from leg stump to make room, then slices the ball behind backward point for four
length ball heading for middle and leg, punched towards midwicket
a bouncer just outside off, too high from Malinga
slower offcutter, dropped towards cover for a single
length ball on the pads, helped towards deep backward square leg to make it nine off the over
outside off, helped along towards third man
full and wide, thumped towards sweeper cover off the front foot
again Smith does that little jump which takes him beyond leg, the ball is outside off, Smith can't get bat on it
again a long way outside leg stump before the ball is delivered, Kula follows him, worked to midwicket for a single that brings up the 150

outrageous shot from de Villiers, that was wide of off stump, fullish slow ball, de Villiers gets his front leg across before bending and dinking the ball over his shoulder and towards fine leg, not quite the Dilscoop but not a conventional stroke either
initially looked to repeat the stroke before changing his mind and dropping the ball towards cover

slow bouncer on leg stump from Malinga, good delivery that but even better by AB,  he was taken by surprise by the lack of pace on it, but then he waited for the ball and pulled it behind square leg for four, didn't try to power that one, just guided it
four more, de Villiers skips beyond leg like Smith has so often today, makes the room to a fullish ball just outside off, drives that through extra cover for four
this is turning out to be a superb contest, AB again moves beyond leg, Malinga fires it wider outside off, not so far away from the stumps to be called a wide but far enough to evade de Villiers
played with soft hands towards point for a single
hurtling in just outside off, Smith works it towards point
works that to midwicket for one more, good over that for south Africa

de Villiers falls over as he plays that but still gets enough power behind it to get a boundary, it was wide outside off stump, full ball, de Villiers had a long way to reach across, he thumps it past extra cover to being up yet another half-century
doesn't time this too well, thrashes it towards sweeper cover
a yorker and outside off, Smith had moved beyond leg stump once more, can't get across to that one, nicely done by Kula

this is a lightning outfield, Smith didn't time that flat-batted shot down the ground too well, still the ball eludes the chasing mid-on, for a change inside of moving beyond leg, Smith charges down the track to play that

nearly a run-out Smith pushes the ball towards extra cover and sets off, there was no run in that, straight at Dilshan, who had only one stump to aim at, Kula was back at the stumps ready to collect the throw, Dilshan goes for the direct hit though they seemed like there was enough time to throw it to the bowler, his throw misses, Smith survives
a wide full toss, de Villiers flays it towards third man, thick outside edge that
Senanayake bowls the final over of the Powerplay, reverse-sweep towards point
length ball on middle, swept firmly towards deep square leg
Sanga was convinced that was lbw, the bowler hardly appealed, seemed to be too high, that one spun in from outside off, struck AB in front of middle
slugged towards deep midwicket
charges down and tries to hammer it over the leg side, misses an struck on the pads
works it to square leg for a single, that's a good over from Senanayake
length ball angling down leg, strikes the pads, stifled lbw appeal
gets on one knee and looks to flamboyantly whip that over midwicket, misses
defended towards point off the front foot
a full ball outside off, de Villiers goes for the reverse-sweep, risky strategy that, thin edge past the keeper
defended towards cover by Smith
length ball on the pads, Smith can't glance it away, that was heading down leg so there's no lbw appeal
sweeps it behind square leg
SA losing a bit of momentum here, de Villiers defends this towards the bowler
short and wide, slapped off the back foot behind point
that'll help SA, Smith pulls off another meaty blow, over his favourite midwicket region, gets on one knee and slog-sweeps that into the crowd
short of length ball on off stump, defended down the track
driven firmly towards sweeper cover, through the legs of short cover
a length ball is worked towards mid-on
"Two, two," says Smith as he pushes the ball towards long-off, can only get a single though
stunning from AB, not too far from off stump that ball, an arm ball, de Villiers makes room and stylishly dispatches that behind point, timing + placement
punched towards long-off for a single
length ball just outside off, defended to the off side for a single that brings up South Africa's 200
Senanayake has a huge lbw appeal, after Smith goes for the sweep and is struck on the thigh pad, that hit him well outside off, Dilshan wonder whether  to go for the review, decides against it

for a moment there, the crowd would have though Smith was going to miss his century, he slammed towards wide long-on, not with as much power as he would have liked, it bisects the two fielders though, and Smith is relieved

joy for Smith, an ODI century after a long time, he gets there with a nudge towards square leg, that's his first century since his epic in the Champions Trophy in 2009, these two innings should keep the critics at bay for a bit
a reverse-paddle towards short third man, a tight single is taken
attempts an inventive reverse-sweep, a powerful one, can't connect though
full ball just outside leg, de villiers makes room and manages to time that perfectly towards deep extra cover
goes for the big sweep, inside-edges on to the front pad
pitched up and that is driven off the front foot, through covers for two
more innovation from Smith, a vertical sweep from de Villiers, sends the ball racing past short fine leg for four
spins away after pitching well outside off, Smith still swipes that towards midwicket
de Villiers has been looking to reverse-sweep the ball powerfully over backward point several times now, again it doesn't come off, an edge towards cover
pure power from Smith, a length ball, Smith makes some room, gets on one knee and clobbers that over midwicket for a flat, brutal six, the 150 stand is up
Smith loves the leg side, this time he tries to paddle a ball way outside off towards fine leg
now the reverse-sweep is botched, lots of fancy strokes being attempted here
reverts to the basics, get on one knee and thumps another length ball over midwicket, six more and South Africa in top gear here, again loads of power
full and wide, de Villiers guides that towards sweeper cover for a single
shuffles across the stumps, once more he attempts to work a ball outside off towards the leg side, this was a full toss, off the back of the bat this time and towards third man, lucky for Smith
goes for the back of the hand slower ball, ends up as a high full toss, thanks a lot say AB as he murders that behind square leg for four

Perera having trouble landing the ball here, de Villiers having no trouble sending it to the boundary, it was another high full toss, de Villiers thumps that wide of extra cover for four more, timing and placement there
thrashes this full ball towards long-on, only a single this time
another low full toss, Smith is happy to push it to long-on for a single
full and outside off, Smith backing away, has to reach across to that one, helped down to third man
looks to paddle this one, can't connect well, off the bat and on to the pads, then towards square leg
whoah, that was brutal from Smith, a pitched up ball is absolutely drilled past the bowler, through the bowler's legs, long-on was a spectator

now the familiar swipe to midwicket, even Malinga struggling to keep the runs down now, a slower one, short of length and outside off, the broad blade of Smith sends it flying over midwicket for another boundary
full ball heading for off stump, squeezed out towards mid-off
yorker on the stumps, dug out towards cover this time by Smith after making room
dropped that was pretty poor from Dilshan, a length ball is struck by AB to extra cover, Dilshan didn't have to move, around shoulder height as well, likely to prove costly that
slapped firmly to point by de Villiers
third dot ball in a row, a slower full ball outside off, de Villiers looks to swipe that to midwicket but misses

outrageous batting from de Villiers, falls over as he attempts a paddle, that was slow and full and at least two feet outside off stump, de Villiers bends and the nhas to wait for the ball to arrive, somehow manages to get it down to fine leg
no trouble with the timing or amount of contact on that one, thrashed down the ground, long-on does well to stop that

long-on can do nothing to stop this one though, a poor delivery to end a what had been good over, a hit-me full toss, AB hits it, clobbers it towards the sightscreen for four, and he's into his nineties

taken, Chandimal pulls off a much tougher catch than the one Dilshan spilled previous over, a low full toss that Smith thumped towards midwicket, Chandimal leaps to pluck that overhead catch and end a crucial innings from Smith, who gets an ovation as he walks off
a yorker on middle stump, a bit of an inside-edge towards square leg
a low full toss outside off, helped towards long-on for a single
a full toss on the pads, easy put away for Albie, flicked towards midwicket for four
full and outside off, guided down to third man for one more
slower ball from Malinga, keeps it full and on off stump, worked towards square leg for a single
swings a short of length ball towards square leg for a single
good ball from Kula, a yorker just outside off, blocked by Albie
full ball just outside off, Albie sweeps it towards midwicket
short of length ball outside off, AB looks to thrash it through the off side, not timed too well, the ball rolls towards cover
full and wide outside off, steers it towards backward point, should have been a dot ball but Senanayake shies at the stumps and he misses, gives away an overthrow
short of length ball is scythed over cover for a single, he moves on to 97, end of a good spell from Kula

smash! sensational way to bring up your hundred, take a bow AB! his 12th ODI century, Malinga is one of the finest limited-overs bowlers around, de villiers doesn't care, slams that over midwicket, a clean strike sends that into the crowd
short of length ball from Malinga, Albie gets a big stride in and slams that wide of long-on for four, not been the best of days for Malinga this

better from Malinga, a yorker outside off, squeezed towards backward point, Thirimanne fires it in at the bowler's end, he misses what could have been a run-out, possibility of an over throw as the ball goes towards long-on, but the batsmen had run too far beyond the crease
a full ball is thumped back towards Malinga, who does well to get a hand on it, fields well but then concedes an overthrow as he attempts to fling down the stumps at the bowler's end
poor ball to finish the over, full and on the pads, helped along to deep backward square leg for four
Perera begins with a low full toss outside off, slapped towards midwicket
a low full toss outside off, punched towards long-off
another low full toss, wider outside off, thrashed towards long-off for one more

Albie is run-out,  not much of a celenbration from the Sri Lankans, full and on the stumps, Albie thrashes it towards midwicket, Dilshan fields, reaslises this time he doesn't need to get the direct hit, throws it to Perera who runs out Albie

utterly stunning batting from AB, he's hardly on the pitch when he plays this shot, it was full and several feet outside off, AB has somehow managed to get even wider than that delivery and then scoops it for six over fine leg, toying with the bowling here, falls over as he plays that but he still connects well enough, awesome!
and just to show that it was no fluke, he does it again! can't blame the bowler when he comes up against batting like this, South Africa's 300 is up
not quite where he wanted to hit that, thick outside edge towards third man for four
full and outside off, AB looks to thrash that over long-on, can't connect
another dot ball, full and outside off, AB was skipping beyond leg, can't reach it
yorker outside off, forces it just past the bowler and down to long-on, Duminy always wanted two, pushes AB for the second

a huge cheer as the final ball goes for four, AB shows he can do it against Malinga as well, full and outside off, once more AB journeys almost to the edge of the pitch and then dinks the ball to fine leg

inn2.comm: begins with a length ball just outside off, defended from the crease to the off side
on the pads, helped in front of square leg for the first run of the innings
driven on the up towards cover, not too well timed by Dilshan
on the pads once more, nudged behind square leg for one more
short of length ball, inside-edged on to the pads by Tharanga
edged, but safe, Tharanga pokes at one outside off, the nick sends the ball past slips and fine of third man, that's four to Sri Lanka
another four, much more convincing shot this time, Dilshan gets forward and drives on the up, past point for a boundary
short of length ball on middle and leg, defended from the crease by Dilshan
short of length and straying on the pads, helped behind square leg
length ball outside off, moves away a touch, Tharanga shoulders arms
short of length ball outside off, caressed through cover off the back foot
slants this in towards the pads, helped along towards fine leg

dropped, a length ball is punched firmly back at Morkel, came at waist height, struck his fingers on the left hand, can't hang on it, and worse he seems to be in some pain here, immediately signals for the physio, he walks off the field for some medical treatment, Duminy to complete the over
opens the face to steer the ball to short third man
backs away to create some room, slices this one off the back foot and powers it behind backward point for four
Dilshan is in a hurry, a length ball is dismissed over mid-off, charges out and strikes it cleanly for four
overpitched on legstump, driven down to long-on for a single
pitched up and outside off, driven off the front foot towards long-off by Tharanga
driven towards extra cover by Tharanga
shortish ball, width provided as well, slapped towards point by Tharanga
nicely driven by Tharanga, a pitched up delivery is sent past covers for four, off the front foot, a controlled hit
not as much control this time but gets him a six, one-handed hit as well, a length ball is thumped over extra cover, the bottom hand is off the bat as he plays that
defended towards cover this time
short of length and outside off, slapped towards cover to end another productive over from Sri Lanka
Dilshan goes for the Hoolywood shot, no foot work as he looks to slam an off stump ball over square leg, he misses
off the pads towards midwicket, a quick single is taken
can't stop the boundaries, short and wide from Morkel, Tharanga waits on the back foot and slaps that behind point for four more
short of length, on middle stump, Tharanga makes room and guides the ball towards backward point
shortish ball outside off, Dilshan ducks out of the way of that one
length ball angling in towards off stump, defended towards cover
starts with a full ball on middle and off, squeezed out towards cover
shortish ball well outside off, Tharanga looks to pull, bottom-edges it to the leg side
ooh, close to a wicket there, Tharanga doesn't move his feet as he looks to drive on the up, inside-edged, just past leg stump, past the keeper as well for four
defended off the back foot towards point
length ball on off stump is driven firmly towards the bowler
this time Tharanga connects with the pull, nearly carries towards deep midwicket, lands just short of Petersen there
the typical Morne Morkel length, just back of a good length,  pushed towards backward point
four more, leg byes this time, Morkel sends this down the leg side, Tharanga looks to glance that but it brushes his thigh pad and the ball races past a diving AB for four, 50 is up in no time
shortish ball on middle and off, Tharanga is cramped by that one, defended off the back foot
a bouncer outside leg stump, that was very high
short of length ball on middle and off, defended to the off side off the back foot
length ball on middle and leg, squeezes it towards midwicket, think about coming back for the second but they settle for one
Dilshan needs no room at all to slash the ball past backward point, gets two
Tharana has played the cut very well in this short innings so far, slaps the ball towards deep backward point
Parnell resumes with a length ball, pushed towards mid-off for a tight single

massive lbw appeal, turned down, de Villiers walks up to Parnell to discuss going for the referral, decides against it, it was a short of length ball that pitched outside off and struck Tharanga on the pads, might have been going down and was quite high as well
lovely stroke from Tharanga, through the covers for four
struck on the pads again as Tharanga tries to turn the ball to the leg side
short ball outside off, left alone
length ball is punched towards mid-off
shortish and outside off, Dilshan swings at it and misses
short of length ball just outside off, flashed down towards third man, Albie Morkel does well, racing to his left to stop that at third man
another swing and a miss outside off, Dilshan isn't worried by those
jags back a hint, short of length and heading for middle and off, Dilshan has no room to go after it, defended
defended towards midwicket to end the over
short of length ball just outside off, Tharanga gets on his toes and punches the ball towards extra cover
a bouncer on middle stump line, Tharanga ducks under
short of length ball, short-arm pull from Tharanga, who can't stop scoring boundaries, swivels as he sends that to the midwicket boundary
superb shot from Tharanga, just a push off the front foot, terrific timing, sends that between the bowler's leg, mid-off has no chance
another crisp punch towards mid-off, no run this time

sensational catch from Duminy, Tharanga was looking in great touch here, he's gone for 46 though, Tsotsobe sends in the slower one, Tharanga looks to slice that, off a thick outside edge, the ball swirls over cover, Duminy runs with his back towards the pitch, and then dives forward to pluck the ball even as it fell over his shoulder, South Africa needed something special to end that opening stand
length ball angling across,  Sanga defends to the leg side
a peach from Morkel, angling across the batsman, short of length ball snakes away from Sanga, who pushes at it and misses
Morkel gets another one to slant across the left-hander, this time Sanga is happy to shoulder arms
this one is closer to off stump, doesn't move away this time, Sanga confident enough to leave
pushed towards mid-off for what might have been a tight single, Parnell doesn't collect it cleanly though so the batsmen have a lot of time to complete the run
length ball heading for off, a crisp drive towards mid-off from Dilshan

nearly a wicket first ball, a thick outside edge which flies wide of the only slip, down to third man for four, a short of length ball angling across, Sanga wanted to play off the back foot, third slip would have gobbled that up
clips this towards midwicket for two
goes for the pull this time, a shortish ball on off stump, not too well timed, lands well short of deep square leg
length ball heading for off stump, flicked to the leg side off the back foot by Dilshan
length ball on the pads, easily worked towards deep backward square leg, Morkel slides and stop that, lobs it to the fielder nearby, crowd cheers the team work
keeps it on the pads, worked towards midwicket for a single
smartly stopped by Graeme Smith at long-off, a firm drive from Dilshan
pushed towards cover for a single
worked towards deep square leg for a single
punched to short cover
and once more short cover does the fielding
length ball on the pads, Dilshan looks to glance, can't connect
pushed back towards the bowler
short of length ball outside off, Dilshan shapes to pull, ends up dropping it at his feet
length ball slanting in towards the leg stump, worked towards deep backward point
short of length ball is driven towards mid-off off the front foot
defended from the crease towards the off side
more good fielding from SA, this time it is the bowler, Dilshan punches a length ball to Albie's left, the bowler does well to reach across and stop that
length ball just outside off, defended off the front foot
length ball outside off, a big stride forward before he guides the ball towards point
short of length ball, pushed out towards short cover, du Plessis dives full length to stop that, a common sight this series
defended towards cover this time
"Down," shouts AB as Dilshan drives the ball back towards Peterson, just wide of the bowler
length ball on off, Sanga moves across the stumps and tucks the ball to square leg for a single
short of length ball that Sanga blocks down the track
slides this down the leg side, Sanga tries to glance it, off the pads and down to fine leg
tipped towards square leg for a quick single
length ball on the pads, whipped past short midwicket by Dilshan, Tsotsobe chases from mid-on but the outfield is super quick, he can't stop it, brings up the Sri Lankan 100 as well
full and outside off, Dilshan hits it in to the ground and towards extra cover
looks to drive that, a thick inside edge towards square leg

run-out missed, Sanga drops the ball towards cover and sets off for the run, after taking some three paces, he decides against the run, sends Dilshan back, Dilshan was halfway to the other other, he had absolutely no chance, Duminy had plenty of time to take aim and throw down the stumps, he misses, Dilshan survives, Duminy is distraught
defends this towards backward point off the back foot
the familiar Dilshan outside edge, fiddles outside off with no footwork, would have carried to slip, there's no slip in the Powerplay though, past the keeper for four
fuller ball on middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on
left alone outside off
length ball on middle and off, a push off the front foot, keeping bat and pad close together
a full toss of off and middle, helped along towards deep square leg
pitched up and just outside off, carved towards sweeper cover by Dilshan
shortish ball on legstump, Sanga ducks under that one
short ball outside off, pulled authoritatively by Sangakkara, controls it nicely and sends it to the square leg boundary
Sanga looks to tuck that ball towards midwicket, off the leading edge towards cover
de Villiers tries to distract the umpire with an appeal for a caught-behind after the ball slid down the leg side
slaps this towards point to end the over
length ball on middle, defended back towards the bowler

length ball just outside off, a very tight run, that was pushed towards mid-off, Ingram moves across to his right and fields that, throws while he is still sliding, misses, in any case Dilshan had  just made his ground
short of length ball outside off, defended towards point
length ball outside off, crisply driven towards mid-off
length ball heading for middle and leg, works it to midwicket for a single
a bouncer down the leg side, too far from the stumps

Tsotsobe has struck, a short ball just outside off, inches outside off actually, Dilshan looks to glide that to third man, gets a bottom edge, carries nicely through to de Villiers, is that the last innings by captain Dilshan?
length ball on the pads, helped down to fine leg for four, that was an easy put away for Sangakkara
works it to square leg and takes a quick single
overpitched on middle and leg, helped behind square leg
in the air but wide of the diving man at point, who dives to his left but can't stop it, that's a boundary
length ball outside off, defended off the front foot
short of length ball defended back to the bowler, we will have a result this game, one way or the other
short of length ball on off stump, defended back to the bowler
defended towards backward point
short of length ball just outside off, defended off the front foot towards cover
short ball on off stump, drops the ball at his feet
short ball again, pulled towards deep backward square leg
huge appeal for lbw, Morkel was pleading there, umpire wasn't interested, no review, that might have been pitching outside leg stump
pushed towards cover for a single
defended towards the leg side
punched towards long-on by Sanga
helped towards deep backward square leg
Sanga works the ball to square leg for a single
length ball just outside off, slapped towards backward point
full ball just outside off, punched towards mid-off
short of length ball carved towards sweeper cover for a single
a beamer from Albie, the ball slipped out of his hand, about shoulder high and down the leg side
length ball heading for off stump, defended to the bowler
shortish ball outside off, looks to thrash that towards midwicket, too quick for Chandimal, mistimed towards mid-off
short of length ball outside off, calmly guided down to third man for a single to end the over
short of length ball on off stump, defended off the front foot to the off side
helped down towards deep backward point for a single, the bottom hand comes off as he plays that  shot
length ball on middle and leg, lovely on-drive from Sangakkara, minimal effort, bisects the bowler and mid-on
clipped towards midwicket by Sanga
a stylish cut down towards deep backward point for a single
short of length ball on off stump, pulled towards midwicket
shortish ball on legstump, clipped towards deep square leg
short of length and angling in towards middle and leg, worked behind square leg
down the leg side, Sanga shuffles across and looks to glance it but misses
worked towards deep square leg for an easy single
on the pads, helped along to fine leg for a single
short of length ball on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
slower ball, on a length and heading for middle stump, blocked to the off side
Parnell resumes with a wide down the leg side, too many of those today from South Africa
short of length ball jags in towards the pads, chandimal can't get bat on it, the ball dribbles towards square leg
short of length ball and just outside off, slapped towards sweeper cover for a single
short and outside off, a controlled glide towards third man
full ball outside off, driven towards mid-off, a diving stop from Peterson there
goes for the upper cut, that was a short ball on middle and off, he was aiming to send that to between the keeper and third man, can't connect
the line is slightly more towards off this time, and the length a hint fuller, slapped towards point

a poor delivery from Peterson results in a wicket, or did it? it was short and sat up for Chandimal to hammer, he pulled it powerfully, Duminy  was at midwicket, plucked a low hard chance to his left, he didn't collect cleanly, juggled it on to his body as he rolled over, and after several plucks at it he hangs on, the doubt seems to be about whether he got his fingers under it when Duminy grabbed it after Chandimal smashed it, loads of replays here, it's not conclusive, Duminy wasn't sure either, Chandimal lives on due to a lack of conclusive evidence, the crowd doesn't like the decision, loud boos around the ground
short of length ball spinning away, chopped towards cover
carves it in front of cover for a single
overpitched and just outside off, driven back towards the bowler
Sanga comes down the track, calmly works the ball to midwicket for two
length ball outside off, off the outside edge and towards short third man
short of length ball outside off, chopped towards deep backward square leg for a single
short and outside off, Sangakkara throws his bat at it, can't time it, off the bottom of the bat towards point
short of length ball on off stump, defended to the off side
short and wide, Sanga wanted to carve that over the off side, hits low on the bat and that loops over extra cover
short of length ball on the leg stump, Sanga swivels as he pulls that down towards fine leg
short of length ball on off stump, pushed towards deep backward point, early and urgent for two, Sangakkara reaches his half-century
short once more from Peterson, this time Chandimal doesn't pick out Duminy, he slams it to the deep midwicket boundary, the 50 partnership comes up
on middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on for a single
flighted and full, just outside off, punched towards mid-on
length ball outside off, eased towards long-on for a single, Sri Lanka cruising here
loud appeal for lbw, umpire turns it down, again there's no review, that pitched on middle and looked to be sliding down the leg side
length ball is pushed towards long-on, that bounced a bit more than Chandimal expected
short of length ball on off stump, Chandimal looks to glides that to third man, glanced off the gloves towards the keeper, bounces before reaching de Villiers
length ball outside off, thrashed towards point by Chandimal, can't beat the fielder
slanting in towards middle and leg, helped towards midwicket
back of a length ball on off stump, drops the ball to the leg side and scramble a quick single

this time the cute dab cost Chandimal his wicket, a short ball angling in, Chandimal wanted to get it to third man though there was no room to play that shot, a thin top edge to the keeper, Sri Lanka lose their third
defends his first ball off the front foot towards cover
full ball is punched towards long-on for a single
tossed up, and full, on middle and off, works it towards point for a single
length ball well wide of off stump, eased towards sweeper cover
full ball on middle stump, defended solidly to the off side
too short from Duminy, Thirimanne rocks back and carves it behind point for four
a low full toss outside off, Thirimanne drives off the front foot, Duminy moves to his right and dives, gets a hand on it but can't prevent the single
short of length ball on the leg stump, whipped off the thigh pad towards backward square leg
an appeal for lbw, but that was pitching well outside leg stump
short of length and just outside off, helped towards third man for a single
short of length ball on middle and leg, pushes it towards midwicket
Sanga looks to lash this one through the covers, can't connect with a ball angling away
length ball on the pads, helped towards midwicket for a single
full ball pitching outside off, pushed to cover for a single
overpitched and outside leg, Sanga gets on one knee and sweeps that fine, to the left of deep backward square leg
flighted and pitching on a length outside off, defended to the off side
the towel falls off as Duminy he delivers the ball, driven to long-off
length ball outside off, Sanga charges out and tucks the ball to midwicket
pushed off the back foot towards long-on
punched towards cover by Sanga, a diving stop there by Ingram
a graceful straight drive from Sanga, punches it towards long-off for a single
shortish ball on middle and leg, Thirimanne shuffles across and glances the ball towards fine leg
slower off cutter from Albie, Sanga drops the ball towards point, Sanga wants to risk a single to du Plessis, he wisely decides against it and dives back
shortish ball on off stump, pulled towards fine leg, Morkel fumbles there to give away an extra run, wet outfield + an injured finger creates that extra run, SL's 200 comes up
again sanga pulls to Morkel, again he picks up two
short, wide, turning further away, he reaches out and slaps it to sweeper cover
straighter one on a length, he stays back and punches to long on
bit of flight to Thirimanne, who comes forward to push towards point
angled in full, turned away to fine leg
shortish again and Sanga slaps it hard, but Faf goes diving to his right and saves a few runs
FAf dives again, but this time the ball beats him as it is punched to sweeper cover
gentle back of a length widish delivery that is easily guided behind point to begin the Powerplay with four
more effort and angle into this one from Tsotsobe, Thirimanne shuffles well across and turns it to fine leg
pitches it up but sends it down leg, 100 needed now
ending on to Sanga's pads from short of a length, all it requires is a nudge, and Morne has to put in a dive at fine leg to stop the boundary
eased down to long on for one more
another widish one to Thirimanne, who bends his knee and cracks the cut, but straight to point
tries the short ball angled into the left-hander who pulls off the bottom edge of the bat through square
pushes off the front foot but straight to shortish extra cover
smack! don't run, don't bother to field, Sanga unfurls as graceful a pull as ever, excellent balance, still head, straight arms give him good reach as the short ball is dismissed in front of square
drops the length ball on to the pitch and won't get the single
bit of a leading edge towards covers as he tries to turn this short of a length ball on the leg side
tickled off the pad to short fine for one
shortish ball, pulled towards deep midwicket for a single to bring up another 50 stand
a slower ball, helped just behind square leg for one more
length ball outside off, punched to cover
short ball just outside off, looks to pull that, doesn't connect well, the ball rolls to the leg side
worked towards midwicket for one more single, good over so far
goes for the big swipe, a slower ball, the edge results, doesn't carry through to the keeper
short of length and well outside off, thirimanne backs away and slices that over point
goes full this time, Thirimanne looks to chip over extra cover, just manages to clear the fielder, not hit as well as he would have liked
length ball on the pads, clipped towards deep midwicket for a quick two
slower ball, on a length and outside off, there are five fielders on the leg side, so thirimanne looks to make room and thread it through the off side, doesn't connect
pitched up and just outside off, pushed towards long-off for a single
short of length ball is flat-batted towards wide mid-on
looking to punch that towards the off side, the leading edge towards the leg side
yorker and well outside off, the batsman can't get under that one, in fact he can't get bat on that
full and wide of off once more, Thirimanne can't reach it once again
there's the boundary to release the pressure, Albie slips this on a length, abandoning the full length he has focussed on this over, Thirimanne launches that over extra cover for four
a slower bouncer on leg stump, helped down to fine leg
wide down the leg side
what a hit from Sangakkara, a length ball is clubbed over the bowler's head for four, an over which started well for South Africa hasn't been taken for 11, Sri Lanka's 250 comes up
a yorker just outside off, dug out to the leg side
shortish ball over the stumps, Thirimanne backs away and looks to cut, can't connect
full and heading for off stump, pushed towards mid-off for a tight single
short of length ball, defended towards cover by Sangakkara
length ball outside off, clipped towards square leg for a single
on off stump, guided towards backward point
once more Thirimanne looks to make room and work the ball towards point, a shortish ball on the stump, can't get bat on ball
slower off cuttter from Albie, slapped past a diving point fielder for a single
pitched up and well outside off, carved towards sweeper cover
driven towards sweeper cover for a single
a low full toss on off stump, thumped towards long-on for a single
short of length ball on off stump, uses his wrists to work the ball towards square leg for a single
overpitched ball first up, whipped through extra cover, goes below a diving fielder there

missed stumping, de Villiers has been sublime with bat, not so good behind the stumps, that is a big let-off,a full ball that sanga charges out to, he misses the ball outside off, de Villiers also misses, Sanga survives
punched to long-on for a single
full delivery is eased to mid-off
slashed towards deep point for a single
flighted and full, Sanga looks to hammer it out of the ground, bottom-edges it towards deep midwicket, turns out to be quite a good over for South Africa
wonderful hit from Sanga, takes him to 96, shuffles to the leg side to make room, Albie goifts it on a length, Sanga times that over extra cover for four
pushed towards extra cover, Ingram had one stump to aim at, if he had hit Thirimanne was gone, he misses and an overthrow results
looks to flick this, off the pads for a leg bye
good delivery this, a yorker outside leg, cramping Sanga, who still pushes this away towards deep midwicket, wants two initially but has to settle for one
skews this one towards mid-off, he wanted to bludgeon that towards long-on, lands safe

there's the hundred, his first against South Africa, in what could be his last innings in South Africa, it's been a lean run in this series for him, he was due a hundred and he has duly got it, a full ball on the pads, guided to the backward square leg boundary for four
a low full toss on middle stump, punched towards long-on for a single

gone, JP Duminy isn't the most dangerous of bowlers, but he has got the big breakthrough, he drops the ball a bit short, Sanga wanted to power Duminy out of the park last over as well, this time he ends up chipping it to long-off, Peterson hangs on to the catch
a length ball on the pads, nudged towards wide mid-on
drives it towards long-off for a single

nearly another wicket, of the other set batsmen, that was a terrible delivery from JP, full toss which was almost waist high, miscued but just over the fielder at mid-on, Thirimanne gets to his fifty, what a time to get his first half-century
a yorker outside off, squeezed towards point
Morne starts with a back of length ball just outside off, Thirimanne can't get bat on it
more fortune for Thirimanne, who goes for the pull as Morne sends in another short of length ball, a thick bottom-edge, wide of the keeper and down to fine leg for four

, Parnell seemed to have it covered at the deep backward point, nicely moving towards his position take a cut from Thirimanne, at the last moment he loses sight of it and doesn't even get a hand on that, immediately he signals that he couldn't see it under the lights, more luck for Thirimanne
pushed towards extra cover for a single
only his second ball, Mathews charges out and clubs this over the infield, a couple of bounces and into the sweeper cover boundary, three boundaries in four balls
taps this towards cover and pinches a single
defended by Mathews towards the bowler

the end of Mathews, a full toss above the knee height, Mathews was looking to hit that down the ground, ends up chipping it to short cover, where Peterson takes another catch, surely Sri Lanka can't mess this up now?
short of length ball on off stump, Perera drops the ball to the off side and scrambles a single, Parnell and Duminy were converging on that but not quick enough to stop the run
full ball on the stumps, squeezed out towards backward point, the crowd thinks that was a catch, but it was hit into the ground
guided down to third man for a single
another high full toss, just low enough to not be called a no-ball, defended back towards the bowler
full and just outside off, Thirimanne wanted to send that into orbit, the ball sails past the bat and through to the keeper
wide down the leg side, Morkel doesn't like the call, neither does the crowd, which loudly boos the decision
Morne was appealing for a caught-behind, it was a ball down the leg side once more, off the pads through to the keeper, Thirimanne races through for a leg bye
smoking! Morne bowls his predictable back of a length, hammered to the midwicket boundary for an authoritative four, that is making a statement
slices this towards deep point for a single
full and angling across, batsman chases after it but doesn't connect
a full toss on middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on for a single
a length ball outside off, eased to long-off for a single, sensible stuff this from the Sri Lankans
another single, all along the ground towards long-off
a full ball on middle and leg, helped to mid-on, that's a dot ball
another dot ball, the crowd loves it, this ball is pushed towards cover

forget yorkers, start practising your high full tosses, Duminy sends one of those, Perera looks to end the game in style with a smash over midwicket, he can't get it far enough, the best fielder in the game, du Plessis, pouches that easily, Dilshan and sangakkara signalling a no-ball in the dressing room, umpire signals nothing, that looked to be at an acceptable height

the Joburg crowd yell in delight as Nuwan is bowled first ball, making room and looking to hit that over extra cover, he misses Peterson hits, that crashes into middle and leg, Peterson is ecstatic, six needed off five
well done, he opens the face and guides the ball towards backward point for a single

oh Sri Lanka, this is ridiculous, a short of length ball from Peterson, slightly quicker, Thirimanne charges out and looks hit that through the off, an outside edge carries nicely to Albie Morkel at short third man, Sanga and Dilshan look very tense in the dressing room
dot ball, a length ball on leg stump, defended back towards the bowler, five needed off two, how did it come to this?

Sri Lanka have done it! like in Kimberley they finish it off with a six, over midwicket this time, famous first runs for Senanayake, South Africa did so well to bring it close, but the youngster kept his cool, defending his first ball then unleashing a flat hit for six, Peterson has his hands on his head, the crowd is silenced, not bad for a dead rubber
